Package src

package src
  • Class
    Description
    Chunk
    Chunk holds an nxn array of PositionBlocks and stores the x and y position of the entire array.
    ChunkManager
    ChunkManager loads and holds the chunks that will be used in the game.
    EmptyBlock
    EmptyBlock represents a empty space in the maze.
    EndBlock
    EmptyBlock represents the end location of the Maze.
    GameOverLOSE
    GameOverLOSE creates the game over screen when the user fails to find the end of the maze.
    GameOverWIN
    GameOverWIN creates the screen shown when user finds the end of the maze.
    GamePanel
    GamePanel handles creating the screen and contains the main game loop.
    GameVariables
    This interface is used to store constant variables that multiple classes need.
    GameVariables.Collision
    Enumeration used for collision detection.
    HomeScreen
    HomeScreen creates the home screen.
    KeyHandler
    This class handles key events.
    Main
    Serves as the main file for our game.
    Player
    Player holds character attributes including images, state (Idle, Move...), facing (N, NE, E...) and methods including loading images, updating state, and drawing.
    Player.Facing
    The direction the player is currently facing.
    Player.State
    Player States.
    PositionBlock
    This class creates a individual block of the maze, which could be a wall, empty space, start block, or end block.
    StartingBlock
    StartingBlock represents the start location of the Maze.
    Visibility
    This class handles drawing the visibility of the player in our game.
    Wall
    Wall class represents a wall in the maze.
